segments.text: Well , I am looking for some winter clothes for my fiancee .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , it's the high time for you purchasing in our clothes shop . We are now having a preseason sale on all our winter apparel .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Every thing for winter is 20 % off .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think my fiancee may favor the sweater in the shop window . Would you like to help me look for any skirts that go with this sweater ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , we have both skirts and trousers that would look well with the sweater . Look at this section .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I especially like this flowery skirts . My fiancee will look very elegant in this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have a good taste . It's very much in style this year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think the green one fits her complexion . Do you have any skirts in light color or tan ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look on the rack to the right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes . I'll take this one . Can I pay by traveler â€™ s check ?
segments.speaker: S2
